Name: Colonial Financial Services, Inc
Description: DELISTED - Colonial Financial Services, Inc. is a savings and loan holding company for Colonial Bank, FSB. Colonial Bank, FSB is a federally chartered savings bank. The Company's principal business activity is the one- to four-family residential and commercial real estate loans. It also offers home equity loans and lines of credit, commercial business loans and construction and land loans, and, to a lesser extent, multi-family real estate loans and consumer loans. It also invests in mortgage-backed securities and other investment securities. The Company offers a range of deposit accounts, including demand accounts, negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) accounts, money market accounts, savings accounts and certificates of deposit. Deposits are its primary source of funds for its lending and investing activities. The Company has also used borrowed funds as a source of funds, and it borrows principally from the Federal Home Loan Bank of New York.
